Author: voetre
Name: Position Master
Description: its a position hack, dont use it if you arent okay with that fact...
Changelog:
- 1.2.2.0:
   • Added a 'Preview Position' option in the position saver.
- 1.2.1.0:
   • removed 'fast' button from gui (left over from testing).
- 1.2.0.0:
   • implemented speed hack.
   • 'setpos' has been re-implemented but is now used to set your position on the fly.
   • 'setpos' command has been renamed to 'loadpos', it is still used the same way.
